title: Explorer: At Katmai National Park in Alaska, Bears Rule
text: BING NEWS: Former Katmai National Park Superintendent Fears Park Service Values Visitation More Than Bears With construction expected to start soon on a major development plan for Brooks River in Katmai National Park in Alaska, a former park superintendent fears the Park Service is more concerned with visitation to the area than the bears that rely on its ... 06/26/2015 - 2:00 am | View Link 100 fascinating facts about US national parks 1) Add all America’s National Parks together and you get ...
